title: Xilotepelt FC
text:
Xilotepelt was a <a href="Nicaragua">Nicaragua</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> team. The team is based in <a href="Jinotepe">Jinotepe</a>.
History.
The team has played in the <a href="Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n%20de%20Nicaragua">Primera División de Nicaragua</a> but was relegated following the 2013 Nicaraguan <a href="Clausura">Clausura</a>. In August 2013, the football association decided not to allow Xilotepelt to the second division after a merger with UCEM failed to materialise.
Notable players.
Players whose name is listed in bold represented their countries while playing for Xilotepelt
